alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:57PM AKST until December 07 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph from Kenai south to Homer. Visibility as low as one half mile. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of moderate to heavy snow will continue through this evening before ending from south to north tonight. Snowfall rates this afternoon of up to one inch per hour are possible. Gusty winds may also significantly reduce visibility to as low as one half mile across the Sterling Highway and along the Homer Bluffs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
